channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Natural Gas Futures Give Up a Fraction of Monday's Big Gain
item.description: Natural gas futures close slightly lower following Monday’s 10% rally, as weather forecasts trend cooler, but not much.

item.title: ‘I’ve no interest in investing more money in the stock market’: I’m debt-free, retired and ignoring the ‘Trump bump.’ What should I do with $400,000?
item.description: “I already have $1.5 million in the stock market.”

item.title: Instacart’s weak outlook for the end of the year drags the stock lower
item.description: Instacart says sales are up 12%, but investors worry about weaker outlook and the prospect of cooling demand.

item.title: Strengthening of U.S. Dollar Continues To Pressure Commodities
item.description: The U.S. dollar index gained ground, extending its run and pressuring U.S. commodities sold on international markets.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Decline as Bond Yields Rise and Bitcoin Sets Another Record
item.description: A rise in government bond yields put a pause on a vigorous stock rally that has propelled major indexes to records in recent sessions.

item.title: House governance will be ‘very difficult’ for Republicans due to slim majority: analyst
item.description: Republicans appear on track to maintain their control of the U.S. House of Representatives in the new year, though yet again a narrow majority looks l...

item.title: Elliott Calls for Breakup of Honeywell---One of the Last Conglomerates
item.description: The activist investor, which has amassed a $5 billion stake, is calling for big changes. Honeywell shares were up about 5% on the news.

item.title: ​Trump’s win sparked stocks for this surprising reason — and it’s fueling the market rally
item.description: Investors hate uncertainty; the U.S. election result was quick and orderly.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield breaks through key resistance levels on way to 5%
item.description: The yield on the benchmark 10-year Treasury note moved within spitting distance of breaking through another key resistance level on Tuesday, which cou...

item.title: Comex Gold Settles Lower, Silver Rises
item.description: Comex gold settled 0.4% lower, down for a third consecutive session, and silver rose 0.5%, snapping a two-session losing streak.
